special_text:
[i]“A single man who has the right heart and the right mind, that one man can win a war.”
–Captain America[/i]
Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token and an Invention token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Scry 1.”)[/i]
Put X +1/+1 counters on target creature, where X is the number of tokens you control.
Until end of turn, target creature you control gains vigilance, lifelink, and protection from creatures.
